itunes:title: Hebrews Week 2 with Kelly Minter
title: Hebrews Week 2 with Kelly Minter
description:
Join us for the second week of Hebrews as Raechel and Amanda are joined by author, Bible teacher, and podcaster, Kelly Minter. From high theological concepts to moments of immense specificity, the book of Hebrews constantly points to the superiority of Jesus. Exploring this superiority through the daily readings, Raechel, Amanda, and Kelly remind us of what we can know with full assurance—because Jesus is superior, His life alone is the only sufficient sacrifice.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Hebrews reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Hebrews collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/hebrews-week-2-with-kelly-minter
